bike.description: A2-SL compact double-butted alloy w/ hydroformed top tube & down tube, integrated head tube, double water bottle mounts
sizes: XXS (35cm/650C), XS (46cm), S (49cm), S/M (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), XL (61cm)

components.description: A2-SL alloy tapered seatstays/chainstays w/ rack mount, forged-road dropout w/ 1 eyelet and replaceable derailleur hanger
FC-770 carbon integrated w/ 1 1/8" alloy steerer
Aero Road platform w/ clips and straps
Vera Corsa double-wall aero alloy clincher, 20/24H alloy road rims, bladed spokes
Vera Helios, 60 tpi, 700c x 25mm, wire bead, (XXS Vera Invictus 650c x 23mm)
FSA Orbit CE 1 1/8" integrated w/ alloy top cover
